text:
Hello HubSpot Community,
I hope everyone is doing well. I'm reaching out to seek guidance on a challenge I've been facing with our weekly newsletters. Every week, I have to create a newsletter that features multiple articles. The current process involves manually inputting an image, meta description, and link for each article, which is quite time-consuming.
Is there any way to automate or streamline the process of embedding these links into our marketing emails? Ideally, I'm looking for a solution where I can simply paste the article link, and it automatically fetches the image and meta description, similar to how some social media platforms preview links.
If anyone has faced a similar challenge and found a solution or if there are any tools or integrations within HubSpot that can assist with this, I would greatly appreciate your insights.
Thank you in advance for your help and suggestions!

I havenâ€™t tested this personally, but you might be able to create a custom module to pull this off. I did a quick test and was able to add <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/module-theme-fields#blog|a Blog Field> to a module, so it would track that you should be able to use that to pull recent post information.
